content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also offers a good value for the price. I'm flexible with the rent, but I think a fair price would be around 650 Euro per month, all inclusive. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 650 Euro per month is a very reasonable offer, Yi-Nuo. However, considering the prime location of the apartment and the amenities it offers, I was hoping for something a bit higher. How does 700 Euro per month sound to you? This would include all utilities and services.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 700 Euro per month is a bit higher than my initial expectation, but I understand that the location and amenities are important factors. Since the apartment is unfurnished, could we negotiate on the price, perhaps with a slight discount?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. I'm willing to negotiate. How about 680 Euro per month? This would still be a good deal considering the central location and the ease of access to all amenities. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 680 Euro per month is a more attractive offer. It's closer to my initial budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. The apartment seems to meet all my needs, so I'm inclined to accept this price. Would it be possible to have a one-year lease term with the option to renew?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Absolutely, Yi-Nuo. I can offer you a one-year lease with the option to renew. This way, you have the flexibility to decide if the apartment continues to meet your needs after the initial term. Would you like to proceed with the 680 Euro per month, all inclusive, with a one-year lease and the option to renew?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I agree to the price of 680 Euro per month, all inclusive, with a one-year lease and the option to renew. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
